column1: There are a number of ways of displaying an error message. An error message is indicated on the display of the servo drive (display D1/D2) or via the Moog DRIVEADMINISTRATOR 5. It provides a user-friendly readout in the ""Device status"" window.

The display on the Servo Drive shows the various device states and possible error messages. Two 7-segment displays are available for this purpose. To display an error number and an error, ""ER"" for Error flashes, then the error number, and then the number of the error location.

column2: Errors marked with a dot on the display (D1/D2) can only be reset when the cause of the fault has been eliminated.
